metadata.inclusion:
Start the adding process on the controller side

Once started, start the adding process on the Connectair module by pressing 3 times the Z-Wave button, located between the plus and the minus button, using the included tool.

When added, the LED will turn off
metadata.exclusion:
Start the removing process on the controller side
Once started, put the device in "learn mode" by pressing 3 times on the Z-Wave button, located between the plus and the minus button, using the included tool.
When removed, the LED will turn on
metadata.reset:
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable

Hold the Z-Wave button for about ten seconds
If it was included, the LED will turn back on when reset is done
